datoCmsKey.name: Harmony 'Hbomb' Austin
datoCmsKey.bio: Harmony ‘Hbomb’ Austin is a female/ LGBTQ+ comedian, playwright, & performer with a strong voice and provocative style. She is currently a student at Texas State University, majoring in theatre performance and production with an emphasis in dramatic writing. Currently she serves as the marketing director for Jane Doe Theatre Company in San Marcos, TX
